snippet.title: Remothered: Tormented Fathers - Greenlight Trailer
snippet.description:
The first title of the survival horror trilogy Remothered is on Steam Greenlight!

UPDATE 4/25/2017: The game has been approved by Steam users in 4 days! "Remothered: Tormented Fathers" will join the largest digital distribution platform in PC gaming!

Visit this web page to join the game's beta » http://bit.ly/tormented-fathers-preview
